questions.question: The brain is a complex biochemical organ that affects how people think & behave" is the main theme of:
Mahiderâ€™s dorm mates insult her to improve her behavior regarding cleaning. This technique is an example of:
Which of the following is the principle of Gestalt psychology?

options.A: A) Human beings are passive creatures
options.B: B) The child is the father of the man
options.C: C) The whole is greater than the sum of its parts
options.D: D) Human beings have the potential for growth

questions.question: Psychologists who help people with minor educational, vocational, marital, and health-related problems are categorized as:
Which of the following is NOT an environmental factor that can affect perception?
Who is recognized as the father of modern scientific psychology?
Which research method is used to collect data from a very large group of people?
What is the process called when the brain organizes information and translates it into something meaningful?

options.A: A) Studying how bodily events or the functioning of the body affect behavior, feelings, and thoughts
options.D: D) Investigating how learning experiences shape behavior

questions.question: Psychology is the science that studies:

options.C: C) Both overt and covert behavior
